titleStmt.title: The booke of common prayer, and administration of the sacraments and other rites and ceremonies of the Church of England.
Book of common prayer
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: a¹⁰ B¹⁰ A B¹⁰ C-P Q⁶, A-K.
"The Psalter or Psalmes of David, after the translation of the great Bible: pointed as it shall be sung or said in churches" has separate dated title page.
Lacks the added bifolium with the proclamation, a reprint of STC 8344, the first leaf of which is signed a5. This copy also has STC 7748.3, Prayers for the parliament, bound in before Morning.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
